elements.description: This cult can exalt Edge followers.
elements.comments: This aspect exists to mark cults that are able to produce Edge exalts.

elements.description: This cult can exalt Winter followers.
elements.comments: This aspect exists to mark cults that are able to produce Winter exalts.

elements.description: This cult can exalt Heart followers.
elements.comments: This aspect exists to mark cults that are able to produce Heart exalts.

elements.comments: This aspect exists to mark cults that are able to produce Moth exalts.

elements.description: This cult can't exalt any followers.
elements.comments: This aspect exists to mark cults that are unable to produce exalts.
This cult can't recruit acquaintances (or this acquaintance cannot.be recruited) in the normal manner.
This cult can't recruit independents (or this independent cannot be recruited) in the normal manner.
This cult can't promote believers (or this believer cannot be promoted) in the normal manner.

elements.description: This cult can't exalt disciples in the usual manner.
elements.comments: This cult can't exalt disciples (or this disciple cannot be exalted) in the normal manner.
